speaker: Doctor
text: Hi, how have you been feeling lately with your pregnancy and the levothyroxine?

speaker: Patient
text: I've been feeling okay, but I'm a bit worried about whether the dose is right during pregnancy.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's a good point. Pregnancy can affect thyroid hormone levels. Have you had any recent blood tests to check your TSH levels?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I had one last week, but I haven't seen the results yet.

speaker: Doctor
text: I'll check those results now. It's important to adjust the levothyroxine dose if needed to maintain optimal thyroid function during pregnancy.

speaker: Patient
text: I just want to make sure everything is on track, especially after my previous miscarriage.
